markdownRemark.html:
Introduction

This lens is a good one. The 36mm equivalent focal length on an APS-C body is very useful for street photography. The lens is very sharp. The color is nice as well.

Close-up shorts has enough blur bokeh.

Sample Photos

A tree with very nice color. It’s exactly how I saw it.

f/8, 1/60, ISO 500

The color is nice. Again, very close to what I saw.

f/8, 1/60, ISO 125

Another angle of the street.

f/8, 1/60, ISO 320
